summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of University Street, from the east margin of Post Street to the west of Railroad Avenue, all in The City of Seattle, by constructing an overhead foot bridge twelve (12) feet wide, together with all necessary stairways and approaches, all in accordance with Resolution No. 3006 of the City Council of The City of Seattle; and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
